text: The Honda ZR-V is a compact Crossover SUV made by Honda since 2022. == History and Features == The development of the ZR-V was led by Shuichi Ono. It was later shown in The United States in April 2022 as the new Honda HR-V. It was launched in 2022 as a 2023 model. Later it was launched in Europe and China as the ZR-V because it sold alongside the HR-V. The SUV has a 1.5 liter turbo and a 2.0 liter petrol engines and also a hybrid version that combines a 2.0 liter petrol engine and a electric motor. All the versions have a CVT transmission. == Markets == The Honda ZR-V is currently sold in North America as the HR-V, China (where it is produced both by GAC Honda and Dongfeng Honda the latter sells it as the HR-V), Europe, Egypt, Middle East Hong Kong, Australia, New Zealand, Brazil, and Japan where it replaced the Honda CR-V. == References == Category:Honda automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles en:Honda ZR-V de:Honda ZR-V pt:Honda ZR-V fr:Honda ZR-V ja:ホンダ・ZR-V es:Honda ZR-V ko:혼다 ZR-V fa:هوندا زدآر-وی ru:Honda ZR-V it:Honda ZR-V uk:Honda ZR-V tr:Honda ZR-V
title: Honda ZR-V
